examples: Fragaria grayana E. Vilmorin ex J. Gay in Ann. Sci. Nat., ser. 4, 8: 202 (1857).
source: Year of death given as 1868 in Gard. Chron. 1868: 899 and Bull. Soc. Bot.  France, Rev. Bibliogr., 15: 93 (1868).  Stafleu and Cowan, TL2, 6: 743 states  that she was director of Vilmorin-Andrieux et Cie from 1860-1872 after the death  of her husband Louis. Year of birth from Charpin & Timbal in Acta Bot. Gallica,154(3):490 (2007).
